text: Gei God ga helekai, “Deeai, doo lodo go Sarah ga haanau dana dama daane, gei goe gaa gahi di ingoo o maa go Isaac.17.19 Di ingoo Isaac i nnelekai Hebrew dono hadinga bolo Mee e gadagada Au ga daahi dagu hagababa ang gi mee mo dono hagadili gaa hana hua beelaa, gaa hai di hagababa dono hagaodi ai.
